description.ko: 보이지 않는 주파수가 장엄한 액체 구조로 결정화되는 소리의 물리적 충격을 시각화했습니다.
description.en: Visualizing the physical impact of sound, where invisible frequencies crystallize into magnificent liquid structures.

prompt: A cinematic visualization of ECHO-0, featuring a frozen pulse of #FFD700 golden liquid metal waves colliding in a dark #4169E1 royal blue void. The soundwaves manifest as 3D parametric oscillations with vibrating frequency ribbons. Microscopic particles of #32CD32 lime light dance to an invisible beat, while #FF4500 orange sparks ignite at the wave peaks. High-speed photography style, macro lens, 8k resolution, hyper-detailed fluid architecture of sound.
